ingredients.item: 200g pack Waitrose Thick Cut Spring Greens
1 tbsp Kikkoman Reduced Salt Soy Sauce

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan and add the aubergine, spring greens and salad onions. Â Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the noodles in boiling water for 4-5 minutes until tender, then drain. Add the noodles to the pan with the soy and honey and cook for 1-2 minutes more.
